Package demolition.world

Class Bomb

java.lang.Object
demolition.world.Entity
demolition.world.Bomb
public class Bomb extends Entity
Defines the bomb in the game. The bomb has 3 states: -idle state: when the bomb is waiting to be exploded -explosion state: when the bomb is exploding - explosion completed state: when the explosion of the bomb is completed
Author:
freel_000

    • bomb

      private void bomb()
      Starts the bomb. The bomb first destroys the nearby brick tiles and the sets its left,right,up,down animation length
